Class BackgroundLayer.TransitionSink

java.lang.Object
  SinkAdapter
      BackgroundLayer.TransitionSink
Enclosing class:
BackgroundLayer
 class BackgroundLayer.TransitionSink
extends SinkAdapter

A sink watching for any attribute change in the lots network. When a lot change its state to another density type, a color transition is started.
